info.name: SMD API - Syllabus Management System
info.description:
Complete API collection for Syllabus Management and Digitalization System (SMD)

## Authentication
Most endpoints require Firebase authentication. Set the `firebase_token` variable after logging in.

## Base URL
- Local: http://localhost:8000
- Production: Set your production URL
